description.en:
Represent is the ultimate Governance protocol allowing for three different applications of voting. 

Geographical: This allows users within a certain geographical area to create geographical proposals, questions, and vote.

Organizational: Any corporation, organization, union, or entity can simply submit a list of registered users and they can then put forth questions to vote on 

Crypto DAO based. Similiar to how Ferrum offers a white label staking service, we offer a white label DAO service.
